Summary: Lightning fast flash across clear sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI was going out back in my backyard late Friday, Nov. 13th 2009 at approx 0100 in the morning. I was on my back porch looking at the stars due east. A large object traveling at unimaginable speed crossed the sky, from southwest to north east. I saw a multy colored streak across the sky that was moving at incredible speed, mostly yellowish color, and it was very wide, and very fast, and on a very straight line.It really freaked me out, and soon after , mabey a couple seconds later, a falling star went by on a similar path but a whole lot slower. I watch the sky's around here all the time, and this is the first time I have seen something go by that I can't explain.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Ashland
There were no other sightings in Ashland on or around November 13th 2009
